display_long_description:
PokerStars presents Vegas Infinite, your ultimate **free-to-play** casino with no limits. Experience multiplayer **poker, blackjack, roulette, craps, sportsbook** and **slots!**

Start strong with a **30,000 Chips welcome bonus** and spin for **free chips every 8 hours** with massive jackpots.

Explore **breathtaking environments** from stunning casinos and open-air poker rooms to galactic space stations, or your own **luxury private suite**.

Play with friends or challenge players worldwide at the casino or in private games. **Chat live** and study your opponents’ tells.

Light up the tables with endless **interactive props** and deck out your avatar with a giant collection of **customizable accessories and apparel**.

Choose from **cash, Spin & Go, and tournament poker**, with epic daily tournaments and leaderboards. Become a Metaverse Poker Tour champion!

Check out **craps, blackjack and roulette**, including Infinity Roulette, and put your sports smarts to the test - **all under one roof**!

Spin a **world-class selection** of slots packed with bonuses and huge prizes. Play in companion mode, your private suite, at the casino, or the Slots Floor!

Win enormous prizes with Vegas Infinite’s own **progressive Infinity Jackpot!**

Take Vegas home with you with **full mixed reality support**!

Your big night out just got bigger. 

This is not a gambling product and does not provide an opportunity to win real money. **18+ only**. Please play responsibly. 

Access to IAP may be restricted by location. 

Vegas Infinite VOIP real-time chat is monitored by ToxMod.
